readable.title: 3266406566_d64e57e65a
readable.content: A black woman and two black children are sitting in a thatched tent . A woman and two kids sit in a straw hut with a blue blanket on the floor . Three African children sitting in a bamboo tent . Three young children are sitting on the floor of a grass hut . Two children and one young woman inside a straw hut , looking outwards .
